title: Social Media Buzz: From The Super Bowl To Groundhog Day
teaser: Annie Colbert of Mashable joins us to look at stories in the news that are reverberating online.
contentencoded:
Annie Colbert of Mashable joins Here & Now’s Robin Young to look at stories in the news that are reverberating online, including a Super Bowl celebration that viewers did not see on TV yesterday, photos of snow as a new snowstorm hitsÂ the Northeast after blanketing parts of the Midwest, and a story about a Seattle teacher who was recently pepper sprayed by police at a Martin Luther King Day rally.

Some of Annie’s snow photo/video picks:
  • A snow time-lapse in Massachusetts
  • “In Chicago, we call it winter”
  • Cloud Gate sculpture in Chicago
  • Time-lapse of driving in Detroit snow

Guest

  • Annie Colbert, viral content editor at the news and social media website Mashable. She tweets @anniecolbert.

Read More Via Mashable

  • Seattle police pepper sprayed a teacher who was walking and talking to his mom
  • Doug Baldwin fake pooped a football at the Super Bowl
  • Watch Katy Perry's quirky Super Bowl Halftime Show
